title: Cry For Me
description: For ten years, the children of the kingdom of Valin have been plagued with nightmares--all except for young Lalaith. In an attempt to solve the kingdom's mystery, Lalaith ventures out in the dark of night to discover the unusual cause for the children's unhappiness. Cry for Me is an engaging tale of one brave young girl and her determination to help the children of her village. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters as well as identify and use synonyms and antonyms.
meta: conjurers, defeat, desperate, fabric, plagued, potion, ridiculous, scraping, sorrow
